questions.question: During project execution, who is responsible for ensuring that the project is progressing according to the project schedule?
What is the primary purpose of a project dashboard in project execution?

answers.a: To track project progress and performance
answers.b: To identify and mitigate project risks
answers.c: To manage project changes and scope creep
answers.d: To allocate resources and assign tasks

questions.question: During project execution, what is the correct sequence of activities when a project task is completed?

answers.a: Update project schedule, notify team lead, document lessons learned
answers.b: Notify team lead, update project schedule, document lessons learned
answers.c: Document lessons learned, notify team lead, update project schedule
answers.d: Update project schedule, document lessons learned, notify team lead

questions.question: Who is responsible for ensuring that project deliverables meet the required quality standards during project execution?
What is the purpose of a project status report during project execution?

answers.a: To track project progress and performance
answers.b: To identify and mitigate project risks
answers.c: To manage project changes and scope creep
answers.d: To provide a detailed, step-by-step guide for project execution

questions.question: During project execution, what should be done when a project task is delayed?

answers.a: Notify the project sponsor and request a scope change
answers.b: Re-allocate resources to accelerate the task
answers.c: Identify the root cause and develop a recovery plan
answers.d: Ignore the delay and continue with the next task

questions.question: Who is responsible for managing project changes and scope creep during project execution?
During project execution, what is the purpose of a project meeting?

answers.a: To discuss project progress and performance
answers.b: To identify and mitigate project risks
answers.c: To manage project changes and scope creep
answers.d: To provide training and development opportunities

questions.question: Who is responsible for ensuring that project documentation is complete and up-to-date during project execution?
During project execution, what should be done when a project issue is identified?

answers.a: Ignore the issue and continue with the project
answers.b: Notify the project sponsor and request a scope change
answers.c: Identify the root cause and develop a corrective action plan
answers.d: Re-allocate resources to accelerate the project
